'''Data value''' may refer to:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[Resource location]]s – Strings that make up an ID of blocks, items, entities, etc.
* [[Java Edition data values]] – The list of data values for ''Java Edition'' since [[Java Edition 1.13|1.13]]
** [[Java Edition Classic data values]] – The list of data values for the [[Java Edition Classic|Classic]] phase of ''Java Edition''
** [[Java Edition Indev data values]] – The list of data values for the [[Indev]] phase of ''Java Edition''
** [[Java Edition pre-flattening data values]] – The list of data values for ''Java Edition'' until [[Java Edition 1.12.2|1.12.2]] (before the [[Java Edition Flattening|flattening]])
* [[Bedrock Edition data values]] – The list of data values for {{el|be}}
** [[Pocket Edition data values/Pre-v0.2.0 alpha]] – The list of data values for ''Pocket Edition'' until [[Pocket Edition data values/Pre-v0.2.0 alpha|v0.2.0]]
* [[Classic remake data values]] – Data values used in the [[Classic 0.0.23a 01 (remake)|remake of ''Java Edition'' Classic 0.0.23a_01]]
